title: From Tens of Hours to Tens of Thousands: Scaling Back-Translation for Speech Recognition
author: Tianduo Wang (Singapore University of Technology and Design), Lu Xu (ByteDance Seed), Wei Lu (Singapore University of Technology and Design), Shanbo Cheng (ByteDance Seed), ...
relevance_why: The paper introduces a scalable method for generating synthetic speech using text-to-speech models, which can enhance audio-language tasks, potentially benefiting Haohe Liu's research on text-to-audio generation and audio-language modeling.
background: Generating synthetic speech from limited transcribed audio in various languages to improve the performance of automatic speech recognition systems.
contribution: This paper introduces Speech Back-Translation to solve the challenge of data scarcity in multilingual ASR, achieving a significant increase in available training data from tens of hours to over 500,000 hours of synthetic speech.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous methods struggle with the reliance on large amounts of labeled data to train TTS models effectively, often failing to generalize to low-resource languages.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work employs a targeted fine-tuning approach for TTS models, enabling effective synthesis from a fraction of the traditional data requirements.

key_innovation: Demonstrates that high-quality synthetic speech can be generated from minimal real transcribed data, drastically scaling the training dataset and improving ASR performance.
real_world_impact: The scalable generation of synthetic speech can enhance ASR systems, making them more accessible for low-resource languages, thereby bridging gaps in linguistic technologies.
limitations: While the approach shows promise, it may not sufficiently capture the complexity of real-world speech scenarios affected by varied environmental conditions.

new_terms.Back-Translation: **Back-Translation** is a data augmentation technique where a model translates data from one language to another and uses the generated outputs to enhance training data.
new_terms.Text-to-Speech (TTS): **Text-to-Speech (TTS)** refers to the technology that converts text input into spoken voice output.
